Title: Semper I
Writer: Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon, Alex Gansa
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin, David Harewood
Plot: Political powers make big plans to promote Brody as a national hero, but erratic behavior on his part threatens his media image.
